channel.title: Crown Problems
channel.description: I was wondering how I can get the co owner status on my server to have a gold crown like the owner crown, co owner doesnt currently have one :confused:

item.title: Crown Problems
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

if hes using silab softclient then co owners dont have a fuckin crown. im sure you should know that.

tbh, you should just leave it cuz they can spawn still if they are co…

Read full topic

item.title: Crown Problems
item.dc:creator: @erwinho14 erwinho14
item.description:
@erwinho14 wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:2, topic:256920”]make a player on your server, logout and go into your character file. where it says

character-rights = 0 (or 1). change it to 3 and save. login your server and you should be owner.[/quote]

what are u talking about???
he says co owner status doesnt have a crown in source…

daniel sorry i dont know how to make that

Read full topic

item.title: Crown Problems
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

make a player on your server, logout and go into your character file. where it says

character-rights = 0 (or 1). change it to 3 and save. login your server and you should be owner.

Read full topic
